div.div:
vm-instance01 and vm-instance02 are the
virtual instances that might be built on host01
by your hands.
This script will not be create these instances.

div.div:
If network packets going to send vms on
other hosts and segments are the same
IP segment, they will be passed through
vxlan network.

switch.text: If network packets going to send vms o...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 111px; margin-left: 782px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Network segment that blonging br1 is
a management segment. vxlangw is a
gateway to comunicate from host01 to
vms in management segment.
Vms are also have sub interface vethY
that blonging in the segment provider
network that blonging br0.
host01 are also comunicate by passing
these interfaces on vms.

switch.text: Network segment that blonging br1 is...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
